Name: Mincemeat Pie
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Shake or whip cream to aerate then carefully pour to FLOAT on the surface of the cocktail.
Review: A festive tipple that captures the flavour of that British Christmas staple, the mince pie.
History: Created in 2008 by Bruce Borthwick, Scotland.
